desc: BGB Publishing creates games that are simple to play with interesting strategy. Get together with your family and friends to discover new ways to connect around a table.

layout.text:
Sale Ends Soon!
For a limited time, get 35% off our fast-paced word game Vowl: The Game of Letters Gone Astray.
Time To Play!
Grab your lasso and get ready to corral cows, pigs, sheep and more with our new pocket-sized card game.
